Package com.hotel.system

Class Payment

java.lang.Object
com.hotel.system.Payment
public class Payment extends Object
Represents the class of Payment, which holds the information at the instance the payment is made

  • Constructor Details

    • Payment

      public Payment(String paymentId, String guestId, ArrayList<String> orders, String reservationNum, Date date, double total, double subTotal)
      Constructor for Payment with all fields filled
      Parameters:
      paymentId - uniquely identifies the payment instance
      guestId - uniquely identifies the guest that made the payment
      orders - an array of room service orders that were made in relation to this reservation
      reservationNum - uniquely identifies the reservation that this payment is made for
      date - the date that the payment was made
      total - the total price to pay
      subTotal - the subtotal price to pay

    • Payment

      public Payment(ArrayList<String> orders, String reservationNum) throws ParseException
      Constructor for Payment with only order array and reservation number
      Parameters:
      orders - an array of room service orders that were made in relation to this reservation
      reservationNum - uniquely identifies the reservation that this payment is made for
      Throws:
      ParseException
